title: Princes and Princesses
actors: Arlette Mirapeu, Philippe Cheytion, Yves Barsacq, Fran√ßois Voisin
plot: A group of animators are in their study trying to make a shadow puppet show with fables from different historical periods and come up with six sweet and naughty fairy-tales: The princess of Diamonds, the Boy and the Fig Tree, The witch, The Old Lady's Cape, The Crunch Queen and the Fabulo, and Prince and Princess. All the stories have a moral message but they are not as traditional as it might be thought.
